newsitem.title: SPAIN: Madrid stocks tumble, eye Wall St, futures expiry.
newsitem.headline: Madrid stocks tumble, eye Wall St, futures expiry.

text.p: MADRID, July 18 (Reuter) 1415 GMT - Madrid shares fell sharply in late trade on Friday, eyeing a one percent drop on Wall Street and amid the expiry of the July Ibex futures contract, dealers said. * Ibex down 228.65 points, 3.25 percent, to 6,806.13 * No clear support seen, but closing losses should hinge on Wall Street's performance, dealers said.
"We've been due for this one for some time, but such a sharp fall in one day might make people nervous. We'll have to see what Wall Street does," said a trader at a foreign brokerage.
